turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Hi.I was looking to order three small pizzas from Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One with just pepperoni, one meat lovers, and one barbecue chicken. And all of those with extra cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 small pizzas with extra cheese, 1 pepperoni, 1 meatlovers, and 1 bbq chicken, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: great, your total will be $42, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up, or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 30 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that would be it. Thank you.
